medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain in the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 12 hours prior to presentation, starting with awakening from sleep at midnight. The pain progressed in severity and was accompanied by one episode of nonbloody, nonbilious emesis. Patient feels bloated but denies fevers, chills, constipation, diarrhea, or hematochezia.
